This feature can be not available in your survey. If this is the case, ignore this step.

string-array.name: help_text_survey_taker
string-array.item: Select the search you want to work. Stay tuned to the remaining number of submissions and the deadline for the completion of each survey.
Keep track of your submissions. You can see all the submissions into a single list from the most recent, or you can view by status, for this move the screen sideways.
To start a new submission, tap the New submission icon at the bottom bar. You can only fill a submission at a time.
Select the identifier of your submission. The identifier can be a code, address, locations, etc. Follow the instructions of his superior.
Complete your submission paying attention to the required fields. After completing each page, tap Next and continue filling up finish. You can resume the pages completed already playing Previous.

When finished filling, tap the Send icon. After sending, your submissionyou can go to the Completed status or the status Pending Approval, if you have a coordinator to validate their work. In this case, the coordinator can approve your submission or request correction.
If you are not connected to a network, your submission will be pending synchronization, ie, will not be sent until you have connection again. When connected again, tap the Sync icon.
Tap the Information icon to view all available data submission. You can access this function at any time during the fill.

You can pause filling the submission playing the Back icon. With its paused fill, you can browse through their research and lists of submissions, but can not start a new fill and edit or another submission.
Touch Continue to return to fill. If you need to start a new submission or editing any existing one, tap Stop. You will have to reschedule or cancel the submission that was in progress.
To reschedule a submission, tap the Stop icon, select one of the options available and indicate the date and / or time to make a new visit.
To cancel a submission, tap the Stop icon and select one of the reasons available for the cancellation.

If your submission was not approved, you must correct the fields indicated by its coordinator and send to new validation. When this happens, you will be notified that your submission is Pending correction.
When opening a pending submission of correction, you will see a list of all the issues to be corrected. Select the question by which to start the correction.

After selecting the question, you will enter the Edit mode to change only the fields indicated by its coordinator. You can go correcting question the issue or reopen the list of all the issues to correct and select the order you prefer. Remember to fix all the issues before sending back to its coordinator.
For each question correct, there will be a review of its coordinator indicating what you should do. Always read carefully to prevent a future patch.
You can toggle the display of submission to the View mode. This feature allows you to see your submission without the comments from your instructor, but you can not edit it.
Use the search tool to find specific submissions. Tap the Search icon and type the title of the submission are looking for.
You can work even without connecting to a network, but can not send or receive submissions and updates. To synchronize your submissions, tap the Sync icon.
Tap the Notifications icon to check the latest alerts and updates related to the progress of their research.
In Para Pesquisa menu you can browse through My Searches, Help, About Para Pesquisa and can also leave your session. When you leave, you will have to login again next access.

resources.string-array: Select the search you want to work. Stay tuned to the remaining number of submissions and the deadline for the completion of each survey. See the general progress of all research under their responsibility. To access the Global Report, tap the Report icon in My Searches. You find the general data and total numbers of all research under their responsibility. You can also search for individual reports to track the progress of each research in particular. See the specific progress of a search under their responsibility. There are two ways to access an individual report. One is from the Global Report, touch Individual Reports and select the search. The other way is from the research already open, tap the Report icon located in the lower bar. You can find the statistics of the research presented by selected status submissions. Watch the remainder of the submissions and the deadline for completion of the research. Track the progress of submissions received. You can see all the submissions into a single list from the most recent, or you can view by status, for this move laterally screens. Each new incoming submission, you should evaluate carefully and decide whether to approve, reject or request correction. After their analysis, all fields are OK, touch Approve. If you notice errors in the completion, you need to request correction to the researcher who sent a submission. For this, you must indicate by commenting what exactly the researcher must correct. Be clear to avoid doubts on the part of the researcher. After entering all necessary settings, tap Request correction, and the researcher will be informed. By identifying a field that needs to be fixed, tap the Comment icon and describe the problem. After confirming the inclusion of the comment, you can edit or delete your comment. If the incoming submission is not appropriate for approval and not to fix, you can reject it and the investigator must restart the filling. To do this, tap Decline. Tap the Information icon to view all available data submission. You can access this function at any time during their evaluation. If you are not connected to a network, the submission will be pending synchronization, ie, will not be sent until you have connection again. When connected again, tap the Sync icon. You can track the individual progress of each researcher under your responsibility. To see the submissions of a specific researcher, tap the Researchers icon and select the desired person. You can transfer submissions of a researcher to another if you realize this need. There are several options to transfer submissions from transfer everything to transfer specific submissions. If you want to transfer many submissions of a single researcher distributing their disputes to several researchers, you should do this for steps. Each researcher will receive submissions, you need to complete the transfer cycle individually. Select who will give submissions and then choose which submissions you want to transfer. You can select All other submissions option. It includes submissions not initiated, pending correction and rescheduled, if any. In this case, the transferor researcher will have no submission to fill. You can only transfer the submissions that the transferor did not start. Select whether to transfer all remaining new or set a specific amount. You can transfer all pending correction submissions or select specific submissions. You can download all rescheduled submissions or select specific submissions. Finally, select who will receive submissions and confirm. Use the search tool to find specific submissions. Tap the Search icon and type the title of the submission that you seek. You can work even without connecting to a network, but can not send or receive submissions and updates. To synchronize your submissions, tap the Sync icon. Tap the Notifications icon to check the latest alerts and updates related to the progress of their research.` In Para Pesquisa menu you can browse through My Searches, Help, About Para Pesquisa and can also leave your session. When you leave, you will have to login again next access.
resources.string: Fields or question with pending correction
